feed.title: Darkgen
feed.subtitle: A personal blog on Data Science and Machine Learning by Someone from IIT Delhi.

entry.title: Getting Started with Laser Scanners
entry.summary: A comprehensive guide to help you get started with laser scanners. Learn about different types of scanners, their applications, and the basic steps to operate them effectively.

entry.title: Writing a New Post
entry.summary: This tutorial will guide you how to write a post in the Chirpy template, and it’s worth reading even if you’ve used Jekyll before, as many features require specific variables to be set. Naming and Path Create a new file named YYYY-MM-DD-TITLE.EXTENSION and put it in the _posts of the root directory. Please note that the EXTENSION must be one of md and markdown. If you want to save time of cre...
